FuncDef:
The segment classifier command creates a segment classifier and displays the segment classifier view, or displays the view of an existing segment classifier.
The undo segment classifier command deletes a segment classifier. The segment classifier command creates a segment classifier and displays the segment classifier view, or displays the view of an existing segment classifier. The undo segment classifier command deletes a segment classifier. By default, no segment classifier is created. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a segment classifier.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. It must start with a letter or digit.
